author: rjmholt
body:
[CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fc627a1dba69ad839fcb7fe76b9aa4733e2b371f/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#spellchecking-documentation) specifies that we use `mdspell` to spellcheck our documentation.

But [`mdspell`'s default locale is en-GB](https://www.npmjs.com/package/markdown-spellcheck#british-english----en-gb-), meaning there is a [number](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fc627a1dba69ad839fcb7fe76b9aa4733e2b371f/.spelling#L31) [of](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fc627a1dba69ad839fcb7fe76b9aa4733e2b371f/.spelling#L279) [false](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fc627a1dba69ad839fcb7fe76b9aa4733e2b371f/.spelling#L512) [positives](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fc627a1dba69ad839fcb7fe76b9aa4733e2b371f/.spelling#L47) in the spellchecker. It's a small issue, but easy enough to fix too.
title: Convert to using mdspell with en-US
